mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT si.profile_icon_id, si.summoner_name, si.tier, si.lp, si.s_level, sr.most_champ_id1, sr.most_champ_id2, sr.most_champ_id3, si.winrate, sr.main_lane FROM SUMMONER_INFO si JOIN SUMMONER_RANKING sr ON si.summoner_name = sr.summoner_name ORDER BY si.lp DESC;

SELECT DISTINCT si.profile_icon_id, si.summoner_name, si.tier, si.lp, si.s_level, sr.most_champ_id1, sr.most_champ_id2, sr.most_champ_id3, si.winrate, sr.main_lane FROM SUMMONER_INFO si JOIN SUMMONER_RANKING sr ON si.summoner_name = sr.summoner_name JOIN RECORD r ON si.summoner_name = r.summoner_name WHERE r.game_mode = 'solo_rank' ORDER BY si.lp DESC;

SELECT DISTINCT si.profile_icon_id, si.summoner_name, si.tier, si.lp, si.s_level, sr.most_champ_id1, sr.most_champ_id2, sr.most_champ_id3, si.winrate, sr.main_lane FROM SUMMONER_INFO si JOIN SUMMONER_RANKING sr ON si.summoner_name = sr.summoner_name JOIN RECORD r ON si.summoner_name = r.summoner_name WHERE r.game_mode = 'flex_rank' ORDER BY si.lp DESC;

SELECT DISTINCT si.profile_icon_id, si.summoner_name, si.tier, si.lp, si.s_level, sr.most_champ_id1, sr.most_champ_id2, sr.most_champ_id3, si.winrate, sr.main_lane FROM SUMMONER_INFO si JOIN SUMMONER_RANKING sr ON si.summoner_name = sr.summoner_name ORDER BY si.s_level DESC;
